td.content: s:patient presents with Blood for 11 days. she has a history of Peripheral Artery Disease for past 4 years. pt is a 68 YO F tennis player. she has a history of smoking describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 5 years in her past o:Height 60 in, Weight 128 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 92, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, Ankle-brachial index (ABI) 0.24, MRA lower extremity vessels, Bilateral blockage in femoral and tibial arteries a:Peripheral Artery Disease p:administered Heparin - 80 U/kg IV bolus, performed Ankle-brachial index (ABI), MRA lower extremity vessels, Bilateral, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
